data.name: Guardian
data.description: Founder of the Alpha Flight, James Hudson uses his Battle-suit to dish out punishing attacks to anyone who threatens Canada.

starItems.name: Guardian
starItems.description: Founder of the Alpha Flight, James Hudson uses his Battle-suit to dish out punishing attacks to anyone who threatens Canada.

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> to the primary target

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack cannot miss and cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on each target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.

5.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target, then apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target, then apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on the primary target, then apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing. Bonus attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, on enemy Death, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, on enemy Death, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
On enemy death, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally.

On enemy death, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, on enemy Death, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor

5.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all allies.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally.

On enemy death, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>:
 > On enemy Death, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
